article: archbishop desmond tutu , former chairman of south africa 's truth commission , on friday handed over a report urging beneficiaries of the apartheid system to contribute to reparations to its victims and warning against a blanket amnesty for perpetrators .
abstract: tutu hands over south africa 's truth commission report
